# Others


### PDF

To create PDF documents, you'll need a $\TeX$ installation.  I suggest [tinytex](https://yihui.name/tinytex/)


### MS Word

As might be obvious, you'll need MS Word if you're going to create such documents. I wouldn't recommend this for anything, and so I will spend very little effort explaining to you how to do it.  

The main thing you need to know is how to use a template.  MS Word defaults have been terrible since its inception.
